author: rickywolfy101

text: I finished this game recently and loved it the whole way through. One of the funniest games I've played with nice RPG mechanics (Paper Mario style) behind it, though very easy. I really liked the shorter length as well and felt like it ended right when it should have. Jamie's music was extremely solid and I found this theme immediately memorable, especially that jingle. As much as I do like South Park, I haven't watch any episodes for years and if you'd have told me I would be entertained through a "15 hours episode", I'd have been very skeptical. But hey, they did it and I'm now excited for Fractured But Whole!
author: SupraDarky
